title: Apple starts manufacturing the iPhone 13 in India
content:
Apple started manufacturing iPhones in India back in 2017. The company initially started with the original iPhone SE, but it has since added the iPhone 11 and iPhone 12 to the mix. According to a recent report from Mint, Apple has now announced that it will also manufacture its latest iPhone 13 in the country. The report

The post Apple starts manufacturing the iPhone 13 in India appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has confirmed that it has started manufacturing its latest smartphone, the iPhone 13, in India. Read on to learn more.
